name: ONE THOUSAND BEES
description:
ONE THOUSAND BEES

Made for the GMTK 2019 Jam.

You are a swarm of bees defending your flower from a bunch of birds that are going to eat it before you can harvest its nectar. You have only one resource to do so: ONE THOUSAND BEES.

Design, Art, and Code by Patrick Bayles

Music from looperman.com, SFX from orangefreesounds.com
